## v1.0.5 (February 2, 2015)

* Improve close to close navigation

* Fix hasAttribute used on dataset

* Fix compat with old Android webviews (dataset.undef === "")

* ECMAScript 6
* CommonJS
* "dist/" export for npm and bower

## v1.0.0 (September 11, 2014)
